author: dantraMSFT
body:
This change enables calling the syslog apis to support issue https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/3766

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5144 is dependent on this change and also requires the libpsl-native nuget package to be republished.

comments.author: dantraMSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov, @daxian-dbw, @TravisEz13 FYI: This is blocking the syslog PR and generating a new nuget package.  Thanks.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
I don't have additional comments except for what @iSazonov has pointed out.
One question though -- from packaging's perspective, will this new native code pull in any new dependencies? (I assume not, but want to make sure :))

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @dantraMSFT Can you please address @iSazonov's comments, then the PR can be approved and merged.

title: Add exports for syslog api.
